response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its unique value and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value to you. Considering its worth to you is $10,000, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive price. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 9500}
